buduhimiyanda ugathkama prusanshawata lakkara thibe.aananda himi bahusrutha smruthimath ha gnyana gathika bhikshun athara agrasthana isiliya.aagathagama,dhammadhara,winayadhara,mathikadharabawa bhikshuwakage nishrashaya sampaththayata awashya bawa wepulla suthraaayehi sandahanya.ugathkama thamantada anuntada hithakara prabhathipala labadimata samathbawa nandaka suthramayehi dak we.wachalabawata wada nishshabdathawayehi anusas da mehidi penwadi thibe.anumana gnyanaya prathyawakshaya kara meheya wima budusamayen nirdeshithaya.meya arambaenuye mulaaryamangawusothapanna awasthawedi patanmaya.

prawinayanta garu karamin hitha mithuriyan samanga suhadawa kshethraye idiriyata yannata hamawitama uthsaha karanawa.mama methek pamini gamanedi mata awawada anushasana demin upakara kala kadawathmaduwe shri bodhiraja wiharadhipathi idampitiye wajiralankara himi, mage aadaraniya amma thaththa soyuru soyuriyan menma mage pasale sangitha guruwarayaku wana gamini wanninayaka, widuhalpathi je.rajakaruna, donald jayantha, sudam dayarathna yana mahathwarun aadarayen sihipath karanawa.‚Äùno.109, manikdeniya, walikanda, polonnaruwa rupika swarnalatha ge lipinayayi.2013 rajya sangitha sammana ulele wasare wishishtathama lama gayakayata himi sammanaya mahanuwara leksikan jathyanthara pasale 9 wani shreniye igenuma labana mathisha gajanayaka sisuwata himiwiya.mathishata me sammanaya himi wuye ayirangani madduma bandara rachana kala ranjith premawira sangithawath kala ‚Äúswarnamali sa radune‚Äù githaya wenuweni.labala wiye sitama githa gayanayata hapankam dakwu mathisha mulinma kandurata sewaye lama wadasatahan sandaha githa gayana karamin sangitha kshethrayata piwisiyeya.wiwidha rupawahini nalika sandaha githa gayana kirimata waram labu mathisha ‚Äòderana litl star‚Äô thunwani kotase tharagawaliyata sahabhagi wi siwwani sthanaya laba gaththeya.me wasare bhathkhande sangitha widyalaye sangitha wisharada awasan parikshanayata gayana ha wadana anshayen muhunadimata sudanamin sitina dahathun hawiridi mathisha gajanayaka sangitha kshethraye idiri gamanak sandaha balaporoththu rasak thaba sitina kusalathapurna nawa yauwanayeki.prawina niwedikawaka ha gi pada rachikawiyaka wana kusum pirisge pada rachanayak wana ‚Äúsayuru there handawe hamadamath muna gahewi‚Äù githaya me dinawala rupawahini saha guwan widuli nalika osse ahena nawa parapure gayakayeku wana madhushanka hettiaarachchi gayana githayaki.

‚Äúkaltan kusalana baskatbol tharagawaliya‚Äù me masa (5) da sita (25) thek kolambaa 05, thimbairigasyaya pihiti polis kshethra balaka mulasthana pasipandu kridanganaye di pawathwimata katayuthu sanwidhanaya kara atha.tharunyayata hetak sanwidhanaya ha kaltan krida samajaya ekwa sanwidhanaya karana me tharagawaliya pradhana washayen kanda dekak yatathe pawathwena athara eya ee ha bi lesa nam kara thibe.me pilibanda madhya danuwath kirima kolambaa pihiti kshama godanagille di pereda (1) paswaruwedi pawathwini.me tharagawaliya sandaha pasal kandayam athuluwa kandayam 21 k liyapadinchi wi thibe.
